TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConnectionPoint extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Represents a connection point that is displayed on the outer edges of an activity designer on a workflow design surface.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
A connection point appears as a small square on the edge of an activity designer surface. It is used as a point where a Connector can originate on the activity designer to connect it with another activity designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks An activity designer uses ConnectionIndex to identify a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> in the read-only <xref:System.Drawing.Point> collection returned by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.GetConnections%2A>.
